title: 30" Blue Monster Puppet, Full Body Ventriloquist Style Puppet
features: High quality full body ventriloquist style puppet made by Silly Puppets.
Easy to move mouth. Hand entry through the bottom of the puppet.
Includes 1 arm control rod which can be clipped to either hand for movement.
Height is about 30 inches tall. Lightweight at just over 1 pound.
Puppet can be dressed in child size 2T clothes.
description: This full body Blue Monster Puppet stands about 30 inches tall and is made by Silly Puppets! High quality with professional performance puppet features at an incredible price! He has big funny eyes, a cute round nose, and a large easy moving mouth! The fur around his mouth can be trimmed if you want a more clean cut looking monster puppet or just to show more of his mouth. Insert your hand through the bottom of the puppet to operate the mouth. Included is one arm rod which can be clipped to either hand for movement. For those who have no idea what that means (dont worry, alot of people ask!) the rod is simply clipped to either hand for movement. This is how Muppet and Sesame Street type puppets are operated.Great ventriloquist style puppet for puppet ministry, school performances, talent shows, drama, theater, good clean fun at home, and more!Recommended for ages 5 and up. Children under this age would enjoy having an adult or older child operate it and put on the show for them.
